title: Mark Zuckerberg Reclaims #3 Spot as Meta AI Valuation Hits $1.6 Trillion
shortdescription: Meta AI assistant becomes most-used globally — stock up 120% YTD.
description: Reality Labs reports first profitable quarter ever thanks to AI glasses and Llama 4 enterprise deals.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Saudi Vision 2030 Declared Success – Non-Oil Revenue Now 60% of GDP
shortdescription: Kingdom reduces oil dependence dramatically – tourism and tech sectors explode.
description: NEOM, Red Sea Project, and entertainment cities generate $80B annually — oil now only 40% of government revenue.
author: Macro Anton

title: U.S. National Debt Hits $36 Trillion – Interest Payments Now Larger Than Defense Budget
shortdescription: Interest on debt exceeds $1.2T annually – bigger than entire military spending.
description: CBO warns debt-to-GDP ratio will hit 130% by 2030 — Treasury yields spike as foreign buyers pull back.
author: Macro Anton
